PositiveConnections_ComplimentMessage.ru.li: complimentMessage->[initiator_nameDef] 表达了对 [recipient_nameDef] 的 [complimentSubject] 的欣赏.
complimentMessage->[initiator_nameDef] 告诉 [recipient_nameDef] 他们钦佩他们的 [complimentSubject].
complimentMessage->[initiator_nameDef] 说他们欣赏 [recipient_nameDef] 的 [complimentSubject].
complimentMessage->[initiator_nameDef] 提到 [recipient_nameDef] 的 [complimentSubject] 是多么令人印象深刻.
